events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I'd like to request a refund.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry based on their message content.
Assigning this refund request to the Customer Support Agent specialized in order issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent order. How can I assist you further?
Could you please provide the order number and explain what specifically is wrong with the item so I can process your refund?
The item I got isn’t the size I ordered and it doesn't have the features described. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for acting so quickly. I appreciate your help and will send the item back as soon as I receive the return label.
We've processed your refund and emailed you the return shipping label. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to see if you received the refund and if everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for the excellent support throughout this process.
We’re glad everything was resolved. Closing this case now, and please contact us anytime if you need assistance in the future.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback about your experience with our support team.
Completed the survey and rated my experience as very satisfactory. Thanks again for the prompt resolution.
This refund case has been archived in the database following successful closure and survey completion.
